title: Senior Business Analyst at Boston Consulting Group (BCG)
summary: I am currently a Senior Business Analyst at Boston Consulting Group (BCG) on the NAMR People Analytics Team based out of the Boston area. I graduated from the F.W. Olin Graduate School of Business, Babson College with a STEM-based Master's of Science in Business Analytics.

experience.title: Undergraduate IT Intern 2
experience.description: ● Used Dell Boomi, a cloud-native platform for data integration in order to aid in an onboarding project ● Used HTML, CSS and Base64 to create automatic email responses to incoming employees ● Used Jira platform, a software used to plan, assign and track work and data, to integrate the data through Boomi ● Learned about Virtustream's IT Operations model

experience.title: Undergraduate IT Intern 1
experience.description: ● Worked on improving IT CSAT scores through analysis of data and recommended improvements ● Performed trouble ticket quality reviews ● Researched and defined KPIs for IT Operations ● Conducted industry research ● Performed data analysis, evaluations and reviews

education.institution: Babson F.W. Olin Graduate School of Business
education.title: Master of Science - MS, Business Analytics
Bachelor of Science - BS, Business and Information Technology
